title: Critical Hermitian matrix model with external source and Boussinesq hierarchy
summary:
We consider the random Hermitian matrix model of dimension $2n$, with external source, defined by the probability density function \begin{equation*}
  \frac{1}{Z_{2n}} \lvert \det(M) \rvert^α e^{-2n\mathrm{Tr} (V(M) - AM)}, \quad V(x) = \frac{x^4}{4} - t\frac{x^2}{2}, \end{equation*} where the external source $A$ has two eigenvalues $\pm a$ of equal multiplicity.
